articles.title: 100 Stocks to Buy: Is Sunrun Ready to Run Higher?
articles.description: The solar panel installer’s stock jumped 5% on Monday after RBC Capital increased its target price to $22. RUN moved up five positions in Barchart’s Top 100 ...
articles.content:
The demise of solar is greatly exaggerated.
At least that was the case on Monday as Sunrun (RUN) stock gained more than 5% after RBC Capital raised its target price by 38% to $22, above its current … [+6836 chars]
